Article Title: Perth warning: Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, and Shreyas Iyer show cracks ahead of India’s 2027 ODI plans
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (L), Virat Kohli (C) and Shreyas Iyer (R) - all of whom play single format for India - produced paltry returns in the first ODI vs Australia in Perth. (AFP/AP/IANS)

Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, Shubman Gill struggle as India falter in first ODI vs Australia

Rohit Sharma scored 8 in the first ODI against Australia in Perth. (Screenshot)

Virat Kohli fell for a duck against Australia in the first ODI played in Perth. (Screenshot)

Shreyas Iyer departed while trying to fend off a Josh Hazlewood delivery. He scored 11 runs against Australia in the first ODI. (Screenshot)

Is playing the IPL enough?

Player Match Tournament/Format Date Days Gap Virat Kohli RCB vs PBKS IPL 3 June 138 days Rohit Sharma MI vs PBKS IPL 1 June 140 days Shreyas Iyer India A vs Australia A List A 5 October 14 days

Lack of real match practice for India’s star batters Virat Kohli Rohit Sharma , and Shreyas Iyer could hurt India’s ODI plans leading up to the 2027 World Cup. The recent Perth ODI against Australia was a small warning sign.Kohli, Rohit, and Iyer form India’s top four, but all three are currently playing only one format. Rohit and Virat have retired from T20Is and Tests, while Shreyas Iyer, who has taken a six-month break from red-ball cricket, is not part of India’s T20I setup for the upcoming World Cup in February next year.The Indian cricket team was slated to play 27 ODIs according to the ICC’s Future Tours Program (FTP) 2023–27. The three-match ODI series against Bangladesh, which was scheduled for August, has been postponed, and the first ODI at Perth was not a promising start for India’s quest for the 2027 ODI World Cup. Rohit, Virat, and Shreyas lasted just 46 balls between them, managing only 19 runs.Rohit and Virat were playing a competitive match after a gap of five months and looked rusty. Meanwhile, Shreyas, who has played for India A and in the Duleep Trophy, had his technical flaws exposed again. Both Josh Hazlewood and Mitchell Starc, who stand six feet six inches tall, have a high release point of almost 2.15 metres (nearly 7.05 feet).Whatever length they bowled, the duo generated extra bounce, with almost every ball hitting the top half of the bat. Perth was a bouncy track, and India’s top order looked all at sea.The ball that dismissed Rohit Sharma wasn’t particularly short, but it rose sharply to armpit height outside the off-stump, striking the upper portion of Rohit’s bat. He could have left it alone, but ended up poking at it. The unexpected bounce surprised him; yet it wasn’t due to the pitch — it was Hazlewood’s skill that gave it its sting.Virat Kohli, who registered his first duck on Australian soil, was also troubled by that length. Starc and Hazlewood had troubled Kohli in the past too. In 10 ODI innings, Hazlewood had dismissed Kohli five times — averaging a wicket every second innings. But it was Hazlewood’s new-ball partner, Starc, who sent Kohli back. Kohli went for a booming shot, chasing the ball away from his body, and Cooper Connolly, patrolling at backward point, took a spectacular catch. It was a shot born out of desperation to get off the mark, which we have rarely seen from Kohli in a format where he is an undisputed king.Meanwhile, Shreyas Iyer’s struggles against short-pitched balls are well documented. The newly appointed ODI vice-captain had been prolific in the last two 50-over ICC tournaments. In the Champions Trophy earlier this year, he was India’s leading run-getter with 243 runs in five innings. Iyer had hammered 530 runs during the 2023 ODI World Cup.He had been pivotal in India’s success in both tournaments, but in Perth, Hazlewood exposed a chink in Shreyas’ armour again. Relentless Hazlewood denied Shreyas any width, hitting the deck hard and creating an angle from a good length, which tangled Shreyas up. As he tried to adjust and negate the extra bounce, rising around his ribs, the ball ended up brushing his gloves.The three dismissals have raised eyebrows as the next World Cup will be held in South Africa, where pitches will be bouncy. India will play only two away ODI series to tackle the bounce factor: the ongoing three-match series against world champions Australia, and another against England in July 2026. However, the spice in English pitches has lessened, as it doesn’t suit their “Bazball” approach.In the case of Shreyas, he is playing for India A and, after taking a break from four-day cricket, will likely be available for Mumbai in the Vijay Hazare Trophy. But the big question is whether the two senior stars, Kohli and Rohit, will play domestic 50-over tournaments to stay match-ready. It doesn’t matter how hard they train in the nets; having played enough cricket, they know there is no substitute for real match scenarios.Since Rohit and Virat now play only one format, their rustiness was visible in the first outing. Playing just the IPL won’t guarantee them a spot in India’s 2027 ODI World Cup squad. If they want to pursue their broken November 19 dream and win the trophy in South Africa, they must play domestic cricket to stay match-fit. If they choose not to, they are doing a disservice to Indian cricket and their own reputations.After India’s Test series win against West Indies in New Delhi, coach Gautam Gambhir was asked , “Are Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli still part of India’s plans for the 2027 World Cup?”Gambhir said: “Look, the 50-over World Cup is still two-and-a-half years away, and it is very important to stay in the present. Obviously, they are quality players; their experience will be invaluable in Australia as well. Hopefully, those two will have a successful tour, and more importantly, the team will have a successful series.”Gambhir may have dodged the big question, but he knows the clock is ticking. If he and Shubman Gill want India to take a step forward in 2027, they will need their ageing superstars match-ready. If not, India must blood talents like Yashasvi Jaiswal and Tilak Verma, giving them limited matches to prepare for the 2027 ODI World Cup.
Article Summary: Rohit sharma, virat kohli and shreyas iyer produced paltry returns in the first odi vs australia in perth. All three are currently playing only one format for india. Lack of real match practice could hurt india’s odi plans leading up to the 2027 world cup. The next world cup will be held in south africa, where pitches will be bouncy.

Article Title: ‘Surname’ row: BJP accuses Congress of stoking divide in cricket team
Article Text: NEW DELHI: Congress spokesperson Shama Mohamed on Wednesday stoked controversy after she questioned the non-selection of Sarfaraz Khan for India’s recent cricket assignments. She asked whether Khan was not selected in the India A cricket squad “because of his surname”, drawing an angry attack from BJP which accused Mohamed and her party of seeking to divide Indian cricket team on religious lines.In a post on X, Mohamed said, “Is Sarfaraz Khan not selected because of his surname!,” “#justasking We know where Gautam Gambhir stands on that matter,” she added, apparently taking a jibe at the Indian team’s coach.Congress functionary’s remarks drew a sharp reaction from BJP , with its spokesperson Shahzad Poonawala slamming Mohamed’s post as communal and pointing out that players like Mohd Shami and Mohd Siraj have done so well for India over the years.“This lady and her party is sick. After calling Rohit Sharma fat — she and her party want to divide even our cricket team on communal lines? Desh ka partition karke mann nahi bhara kya? (Are they not satisfied even after partitioning the country?).”“In the same team Mohammad Siraj and Khaleel Ahmed will play! Stop dividing India on communal lines, caste lines,” he added.This is not the first time Congress spokesperson has sparked a row with her comments on Indian cricket. Mohamed had courted controversy earlier this year in March by fat-shaming then Indian cricket team captain Rohit Sharma. She had to delete her social media post after Congress had reprimanded her. In her deleted post, Mohamed had said Sharma is “fat for a sportsman”.On Tuesday, when the national selection committee picked the Indian squad for the two first-class games against South Africa A, Sarfaraz Khan didn’t find a place in the two separate squads to be led by Rishabh Pant.
Article Summary: Congress spokesperson shama mohamed stoked controversy after she questioned the non-selection of sarfaraz khan for india’s recent cricket assignments. She asked whether khan was not selected in the india a cricket squad “because of his surname’ bjp accused mohamed and her party of seeking to divide indian cricket team on religious lines.

Article Title: Serena Williams and Alexis Ohanian combined net worth in 2025: Inside the tennis queen and Reddit co-founder’s rising fortune
Article Text:
Serena Williams and Alexis Ohanian combined net worth in 2025: Inside tennis queen and Reddit co-founder’s rising fortune (Image via Getty)



Serena Williams net worth and tennis career earnings

Alexis Ohanian net worth and Reddit success

Serena Williams and Alexis Ohanian support women in sports



Serena Williams and Alexis Ohanian lifestyle and future plans

Serena Williams and her husband Alexis Ohanian are among the most powerful and richest couples in the world. Serena is one of the greatest tennis players in history, and Alexis is the co-founder of Reddit. As of 2025, their combined net worth is around $430 million. They earn from tennis, tech, investments, brands, and new business projects. They are also known for supporting women in sports and startups.Serena Williams has a net worth of about $350 million in 2025, according to Forbes. She earned $94.8 million in tennis prize money, which is the highest ever for any female tennis player.Serena Williams retired from professional tennis in 2022 but continues to earn millions every year. She runs Serena Ventures, an investment firm that supports over 70 women and Black-owned startups.She also launched WYN Beauty in 2024 and co-owns the Toronto Tempo WNBA team.Alexis Ohanian’s net worth in 2025 is around $80 million to $150 million. He co-founded Reddit, one of the biggest social media platforms in the world.Today, he runs Seven Seven Six, his venture capital firm with investments in billion-dollar companies like Instacart, Coinbase, and Patreon.Alexis Ohanian is also a strong voice for women’s sports. In 2024, he helped launch Athlos, a women-focused sports innovation project in Atlanta.Also Read: Andre Agassi And Steffi Graf Daughter Jaz Steals Attention By Introducing Adorable New Partner Copper To The World In August 2025, Serena Williams and Alexis Ohanian invested in a new US-based women’s sports tech platform that helps female athletes earn more money through brand deals. Alexis Ohanian said he wants equal pay for women athletes.Serena Williams recently spoke at an event, saying she wants more young girls to enter tennis and business. Their goal is not just money; they want equal opportunities for women worldwide.Serena Williams and Alexis Ohanian live a family-focused life with their sweet daughters Olympia and Adira. They avoid flashy luxury headlines and instead focus on future investments building their wealth.Serena Williams plans to expand her beauty and fashion brands, while Alexis Ohanian is investing more in AI, Web3, and women-led companies.Their combined net worth is expected to cross $500 million soon. They are not just rich, they are influential leaders in sports, tech, and social change.
Article Summary: Serena williams and alexis ohanian are among the most powerful and richest couples in the world. As of 2025, their combined net worth is around $430 million. They earn from tennis, tech, investments, brands, and new business projects. They are also known for supporting women in sports and startups.

Article Title: Auston Matthews addresses Anthony Stolarz controversy head-on, reveals what’s really going on inside Maple Leafs camp
Article Text:
Auston Matthews finally breaks silence after Anthony Stolarz’s shocking outburst (Getty Images)

Auston Matthews delivers a steadying message to his teammates





Could Stolarz’s criticism be the wake-up call Toronto needed?

The calm never lasts long in Toronto. When it comes to the Maple Leafs, peace feels more like the pause before the next storm. Just a handful of games into the 2025–26 NHL season, the city already has its newest headline—this time starring goaltender Anthony Stolarz’s unfiltered frustration and Auston Matthews’ cool-headed response. What began as a simple postgame remark has now rippled through the locker room, testing the Leafs’ chemistry and resolve early in the campaign.The Maple Leafs’ locker room has been buzzing since Anthony Stolarz openly criticized the team’s effort after a 4–3 overtime loss to the Seattle Kraken. His words didn’t mince emotions: “I thought the first two periods we kind of let them walk all over us. They just outworked us, plain and simple.” The frustration was clear, and his message was sharper.But in a market as intense as Toronto, even a spark can start a wildfire. Matthews, aware of the brewing tension, chose maturity over mayhem. “We’re a veteran group. We’re all big boys,” he told TSN. “You don’t need to beat around the bush. It’s an easy conversation we all had and you just move on, close the door. We’ve got to be better and we will be.”His words carried both accountability and calm. Matthews didn’t dismiss Stolarz’s remarks—he acknowledged them while emphasizing collective growth.It’s a captain’s response in every sense: owning the moment without letting emotions take over.Anthony Stolarz’s frustration may have stung, but it echoed a truth the team couldn’t ignore. His comparison to Seattle’s Joey Daccord—saying for Daccord “it’s like playing catch in the yard”—was a pointed reminder that Toronto hasn’t been making life hard for opposing goalies. It wasn’t just about one bad night; it was about patterns that need fixing.Head coach Craig Berube didn’t shy away either, acknowledging that “it’s frustration, we all prefer it stay in the room, but it happens. We’ve moved on from it.” Teammate William Nylander also backed the idea that the group must respond, not react. “It’s all good… we know we can play better,” he said.Despite the brief tension, this might be exactly what the Leafs needed—a jolt of honesty to reignite their drive. With goaltender Joseph Woll sidelined indefinitely, Stolarz’s importance has only grown. If his words can light a fire under the team without burning bridges, Toronto might come out stronger.For now, Auston Matthews’ message is clear: it’s time to regroup, refocus, and prove that the Maple Leafs can handle pressure—on and off the ice.Also Read: Connor McDavid and David Tomasek labeled among NHL’s unluckiest players as frustration builds in Edmonton
Article Summary: Anthony stolarz openly criticized the team’s effort after a 4–3 overtime loss to the seattle kraken. Auston matthews chose maturity over mayhem, saying: “we’re a veteran group. We’ve got to be better and we will be”

Article Title: Daniel Naroditsky net worth in 2025: US chess grandmaster’s YouTube income, earnings, death, legacy and more
Article Text:
Daniel Naroditsky net worth in 2025: US chess grandmaster’s YouTube income, earnings, death, legacy and more (Image via Getty)

Daniel Naroditsky early life and chess journey

Chess World Shocked: Daniel Naroditsky’s Final Stream Sparks Questions

Daniel Naroditsky as a YouTube and Twitch chess educator

Daniel Naroditsky net worth and income sources in 2025

Daniel Naroditsky sudden death and global reaction



Daniel Naroditsky was a well-known American chess grandmaster, YouTube teacher, and popular online chess influencer. He was loved across the world for teaching chess in very simple and clear words. In 2025, his net worth was estimated to be around 1 million dollars. He earned from YouTube, Twitch, coaching, books, and tournaments. His calm voice and easy style helped people of all ages learn chess from home with confidence and joy.Daniel Naroditsky was born on November 19, 1995, in California, United States. He learned chess from his father when he was six years old. At age 12, he became the World Youth Chess Champion.In 2013, at just 18, he earned the grandmaster title. He quickly became famous for his smart game style. But people loved him even more for how kindly he shared his chess knowledge with beginners.Daniel Naroditsky was one of the most trusted online chess teachers. He had more than 800,000 followers across YouTube and Twitch. He made long teaching videos, live games, and helpful lessons for beginners and young players.His voice was calm, clear, and friendly. He explained even hard chess ideas in very simple language. Many chess students say they started learning chess only because of Daniel Naroditsky’s easy and fun lessons online.Daniel Naroditsky had an estimated net worth of around 1 million dollars in 2025. Most of his earnings came from YouTube ads, Twitch subscriptions, online coaching, and digital chess courses.He also sold chess books and wrote articles for trusted platforms like The New York Times and Chess Life magazine. His biggest prize money from one chess event was around 17,920 dollars. His main income was from teaching, not just tournament winnings.Also Read: Daniel Naroditsky, Chess Grandmaster And Top US YouTube Teacher, Dies At 29 Leaving Community In Grief Daniel Naroditsky passed away on October 19, 2025, at the age of 29. The news shocked the chess world. Top chess players, fans, and students from many countries shared their sadness.The Charlotte Chess Center and his family requested privacy. Tributes poured in from grandmasters and young learners who said Daniel Naroditsky changed their lives. He will always be remembered as a kind teacher who made chess feel simple, happy, and welcoming for all.
Article Summary: Daniel naroditsky was a well-known american chess grandmaster, youtube teacher, and popular online chess influencer. He was loved across the world for teaching chess in very simple and clear words. In 2025, his net worth was estimated to be around 1 million dollars. He earned from youtube, twitch, coaching, books, and tournaments.

Article Title: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight against the Washington Wizards? Latest update on the Milwaukee Bucks star’s injury report (October 22, 2025)
Article Text:
Giannis Antetokounmpo of the Milwaukee Bucks dribbles up court against the Indiana Pacers (Image Source - Getty Images)

Giannis Antetokounmpo is expected to suit up for the Milwaukee Bucks

Giannis Antetokounmpo’ Injury Status vs Washington Wizards

Bucks’ Expectations and Game Outlook

Giannis Antetokounmpo of the Milwaukee Bucks (Image via Instagram / @giannis_an34)

How Giannis Impacts the Milwaukee Bucks Squad

When and Where to Watch the Bucks vs Wizards Game Tonight (October 22, 2025)

in their season opener against the Washington Wizards tonight, despite dealing with lower back soreness. The Bucks’ injury report from October 22, 2025, listed their superstar forward as probable, indicating he is likely to be available when the team tips off its 2025-26 campaign at Fiserv Forum in Milwaukee. This update comes as a relief for fans, especially after a preseason marked by setbacks and missed time due to illness.The Milwaukee Bucks added Giannis Antetokounmpo to the injury report earlier this week because of minor lower back soreness, but his probable status means he is anticipated to play through the discomfort. Although the Greek Freak faced interruptions during the preseason - including a brief absence after testing positive for COVID-19 and an illness that limited his offseason work - he returned in time for the team’s final exhibition games. His performance during those matchups suggested he was regaining form, and his participation tonight would signal that he’s ready to lead Milwaukee from the start of the regular season.At present, the Milwaukee Bucks report no other major injury concerns for their core players heading into the opener. That stability gives head coach Doc Rivers and his revamped roster an opportunity to begin the season on a strong note in front of their home crowd. Giannis Antetokounmpo remains the heartbeat of the Bucks’ system - a two-time MVP and one of the league’s most dominant forces. Following an early playoff exit last season, Milwaukee made several roster adjustments in an effort to strengthen its depth and versatility. Giannis, Bobby Portis, and Thanasis Antetokounmpo are the lone remnants of the franchise’s 2021 championship team, underscoring how much the lineup has evolved over the years.New addition Myles Turner is expected to play a key role alongside Giannis in anchoring the frontcourt, while the team continues to refine its chemistry under Rivers’ leadership. Oddsmakers currently project Giannis Antetokounmpo to score over 30 points in tonight’s matchup - a testament to his offensive load and importance.The Milwaukee Bucks enter the game as favorites against the rebuilding Washington Wizards, who are still developing under head coach Brian Keefe. The Wizards struggled last season and are focused on nurturing young talent, but they’ll aim to make a statement against one of the East’s powerhouses.Beyond the injury storyline, tonight’s matchup carries emotional weight for both teams. Former Bucks forward Khris Middleton will make his return to Milwaukee wearing a Wizards jersey for the first time since being traded. Middleton’s return adds sentimental depth to the opener, as fans will welcome back a key figure from their 2021 title run.From a tactical standpoint, Milwaukee’s primary focus will be on improving its defense and maintaining offensive fluidity. Doc Rivers has emphasized the need for better communication and faster rotations on the floor - areas that could determine whether the Milwaukee Bucks regain championship form. Giannis Antetokounmpo’s ability to play effectively despite the minor injury will serve as an early test of his durability and leadership as the season unfolds.The Milwaukee Bucks will host the Washington Wizards at 8 PM ET at Fiserv Forum. The game will air nationally on NBC and stream live via Peacock. Fans will have the chance to see if Giannis Antetokounmpo can kick off his season with another dominant showing and help the Bucks establish early momentum in the Eastern Conference race.Also read: Is Jayson Tatum playing tonight vs Philadelphia 76ers? Latest update on the Boston Celtics star’s injury report (October 22, 2025) Milwaukee fans can rest easier knowing Giannis Antetokounmpo is expected to take the floor tonight against the Wizards. Despite dealing with lower back soreness and a disrupted preseason, the two-time MVP appears ready to lead his team once again. His performance in the opener will set the tone for the Milwaukee Bucks’ 2025-26 campaign as they chase another deep playoff run.
Article Summary: Giannis antetokounmpo is expected to play in the milwaukee bucks season opener against the washington wizards. The greek freak has been dealing with lower back soreness, but his probable status means he is anticipated to play through the discomfort.

Article Title: Who are Auston Matthews’ parents? Inside the life of Maple Leafs Captain and his family
Article Text:
Auston Matthews with his parents, Ema and Brian Matthews (Image via: Instagram)

Meet Auston Matthews’ mother: Ema Matthews

Meet Auston Matthews’ father: Brian Matthews

The family’s role in shaping Auston Matthews’ rise

Auston Matthews, the captain of the Toronto Maple Leafs, is one of the most dominant forces in the NHL today. Known for his incredible scoring touch and calm leadership, his rise to hockey stardom didn’t happen overnight. Behind his success stands a strong and supportive family, especially his parents, Brian and Ema Matthews, whose influence shaped his journey to becoming one of the NHL’s biggest stars.Auston’s mother, Ema Matthews, was born and raised in Mexico and later moved to California. She dreamed of becoming a pilot, but due to high training costs and gender limitations at the time, she pursued a career as a flight attendant instead. While working for Aero California, she often flew routes to Los Angeles — a decision that would change her life forever. In addition to her aviation career, Ema also worked for Starbucks, balancing her job with her ambitions and showing her strong work ethic from an early age. Ema’s inspiring journey from Mexico to the United States highlights the multicultural background behind NHL superstar Auston Matthews, one of the league’s most influential players today.On one of those flights, she met Brian Matthews, who was working part-time for an airline while playing baseball at Loyola Marymount University. Their connection was instant, and that spark eventually led to the foundation of a close-knit and loving family. Ema has always been a major emotional anchor in Auston’s life. Her cultural roots and nurturing personality gave Auston a deep sense of discipline and humility that reflects in how he carries himself on and off the ice.Auston’s father, Brian Matthews, is a former baseball pitcher from Loyola Marymount University. A dedicated athlete himself, Brian originally hoped Auston would follow in his footsteps and play baseball. However, when he noticed his son’s growing fascination with hockey, he gave his full support. Brian was instrumental in helping Auston train, practice, and stay focused through his early years in Scottsdale, Arizona. His understanding of athletic discipline and competitive mindset became key influences on Auston’s development.Brian Matthews’ guidance helped Auston Matthews become one of the top NHL stars, showcasing the impact of parental support in shaping elite athletes. Growing up in Scottsdale, Arizona, Auston Matthews trained at local hockey programs that are now recognized as top youth hockey development centers, cementing his path to NHL stardom.When Auston was just two months old, the Matthews family moved to Scottsdale, Arizona — a place not exactly known for hockey. Yet, his parents made every effort to nurture his interest. From taking him to early morning practices to supporting his time with the USA Hockey National Team Development Program and later in Switzerland with ZSC Lions, Brian and Ema stood by every decision.Their constant encouragement and belief shaped Auston into the player he is today — a record-breaking Maple Leafs captain, a multiple Rocket Richard Trophy winner, and one of the most admired figures in the NHL. Auston Matthews continues to lead the Toronto Maple Leafs with unmatched skill and leadership, drawing millions of fans and setting new benchmarks for American-born NHL players. In the 2023–24 season, he made history by scoring 69 goals, the most ever by an American-born player in a single NHL season.Behind Auston Matthews’ incredible achievements is a story of family, sacrifice, and unwavering support. Brian and Ema Matthews’ influence didn’t just help shape a world-class athlete — they helped raise a leader whose talent and humility continue to inspire fans around the world.Also Read: Auston Matthews got the goal, but these Leafs players stole Thursday night in 2-1 OT win over Rangers
Article Summary: Auston matthews, captain of the toronto maple leafs, is one of the most dominant forces in the nhl today. Behind his success stands a strong and supportive family, especially his parents, brian and ema matthews. His mother, ema, was born and raised in mexico and later moved to california.

Article Title: Daniel Naroditsky cause of death: How did the chess influencer and grandmaster die at 29
Article Text:
Daniel Naroditsky cause of death: How did the chess influencer and grandmaster die at 29 (Image via Getty)

Daniel Naroditsky’s sudden passing and family statement

Chess World Shocked: Daniel Naroditsky’s Final Stream Sparks Questions

Daniel Naroditsky’s early life and rise in chess

Daniel Naroditsky’s role as a teacher and streamer

Daniel Naroditsky’s final activity and global tributes

Daniel Naroditsky, a popular American chess grandmaster and online teacher, has died at the young age of 29. His death was announced by the Charlotte Chess Center on October 20, 2025. The cause of death has not been shared, and his family has asked for privacy. The news has shocked the chess world, as Daniel was active just days before. Fans and top players are sharing emotional tributes for him online.The Charlotte Chess Center confirmed Daniel Naroditsky’s death on October 20, 2025. They said he passed away a day earlier, on October 19. His family has requested privacy, and they did not share how he died.There is no confirmed cause of death, and no reports of any incident or foul play. Major chess groups like U.S. Chess also shared the news and honored his impact on the game.Daniel Naroditsky was born in California in 1995. He started playing chess at age six. At just 12 years old, he won the Under-12 World Youth Chess Championship in 2007.He became a grandmaster in 2013 at age 18, which is a rare and very high honor. He quickly became one of the most trusted and respected young minds in American chess.Daniel Naroditsky was loved not only as a player but also as a teacher. He explained chess in very simple words on YouTube and Twitch, helping beginners learn with ease.His calm voice and friendly teaching style made thousands of people follow him. Big platforms like Chess.com and U.S. Chess praised him for making learning fun and easy for all ages.Daniel Naroditsky last posted a chess video on YouTube on October 17, 2025, just two days before his death. After the news came out, tributes flooded social media from FIDE, Chess.com, top players, and fans all over the world.Many called him a kind, humble, and brilliant person. As of now, the cause of his death is still private, and everyone is honoring the family’s request for respect.As of October 21, 2025, the Charlotte Chess Center has confirmed that an autopsy is currently underway to determine the medical reason behind Daniel Naroditsky’s sudden death. The results will most likely remain private, as his family has again stated that they do not wish to release any personal details.Many prominent personalities have extended their condolences to the family, including top names such as Magnus Carlsen, Fabiano Caruana, Hikaru Nakamura, and Levy Rozman, as well as several students who were personally trained under him.Youth chess academies in the United States have also confirmed that new scholarship tournaments will now be named in his memory, including one announced today by Bay Area Chess, the same organization that supported him as a young prodigy.
Article Summary: The charlotte chess center confirmed daniel naroditsky’s death on october 20, 2025. They said he passed away a day earlier, on october 19. His family has requested privacy, and they did not share how he died. The cause of death has not been shared, and his family has asked for privacy.

Article Title: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight against the Brooklyn Nets? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (October 22, 2025)
Article Text:
LaMelo Ball (Image via AP)

LaMelo Ball is officially cleared

Charlotte Hornets

LaMelo Ball’s Injury Report vs Brooklyn Nets (October 22, 2025)

Charlotte Hornets’ Updated Injury Report vs Brooklyn Nets

LaMelo Ball (Image via Getty)

The Charlotte Hornets are expected to start the following lineup:

Brooklyn Nets’ Injury Report vs Charlotte Hornets (October 22, 2025)

What to Watch For in Tonight’s Charlotte Hornets vs Brooklyn Nets Game

and ready to take the court tonight as theopen their 2025–26 NBA campaign against the Brooklyn Nets at Spectrum Center in Charlotte. The 24-year-old star point guard, coming off an impressive preseason, headlines a Hornets roster eager to make a strong statement in front of their home crowd.According to the latest injury updates and team confirmations, LaMelo Ball is fully active for the season opener. The Charlotte Hornets will be without only two players - Josh Green, who continues his recovery from left shoulder surgery, and Grant Williams, sidelined after right knee surgery. With the majority of the roster healthy, Charlotte enters Opening Night nearly at full strength.Ball’s return is a major boost for the Hornets after an injury-hit 2024-25 season limited his appearances to 47 games. Despite the setback, he averaged an impressive 25.2 points, 4.9 rebounds, and 7.4 assists per game while knocking down 3.8 three-pointers on average. His ability to control tempo and create scoring opportunities makes him the focal point of the Hornets’ offense.Building on his chemistry with Brandon Miller and Miles Bridges, Ball will now have added firepower alongside newly acquired guard Collin Sexton, providing the team with more speed and scoring versatility.For the October 22 game, the Hornets’ official injury report lists:• Josh Green – Out (shoulder surgery)• Grant Williams – Out (ACL recovery)All other core players - including LaMelo Ball, Brandon Miller, Miles Bridges, Collin Sexton, and rookie standout Kon Knueppel - are cleared to play. LaMelo Ball (PG), Collin Sexton (SG), Brandon Miller (SF), Miles Bridges (PF), and Kon Knueppel (SF/SG hybrid).The Brooklyn Nets enter the contest nearly injury-free, with only Haywood Highsmith ruled out due to knee recovery. Their projected starting lineup features Cameron Thomas, Michael Porter Jr., Nic Claxton, Terance Mann, and Ziaire Williams - a young and athletic group ready to test Charlotte’s revamped defense.In recent history, Brooklyn has maintained the upper hand, winning seven of the last ten meetings against Charlotte. However, with a healthy LaMelo Ball leading the charge, the Hornets will look to shift the narrative, particularly in front of their home fans.Tonight’s clash promises fast-paced action, with plenty of highlight plays expected from Ball and Miller. The Charlotte Hornets are likely to emphasize transition offense and pick-and-roll sets, capitalizing on Ball’s elite court vision to generate open looks for Bridges and Knueppel. The absence of Green and Williams may hurt their perimeter defense, so disciplined rotations will be vital.For Brooklyn, the focus will be on maintaining spacing and exploiting Charlotte’s weakened wing defense. Expect Cameron Thomas and Michael Porter Jr. to be aggressive early, while Nic Claxton’s interior presence could test the Hornets’ frontcourt depth.The game tips off at 7 p.m. ET (4:30 a.m. IST), with live coverage available on NBC and Peacock.As the Charlotte Hornets embark on their new season, all eyes will be on LaMelo Ball - healthy, motivated, and determined to prove that when he’s on the floor, he remains one of the league’s most electrifying and impactful guards. Tonight’s opener marks the first step in what Charlotte hopes will be a breakout season.
Article Summary: The charlotte hornets open their 2025–26 nba campaign against the brooklyn nets at spectrum center in charlotte. The hornets will be without only two players - josh green, who continues his recovery from left shoulder surgery, and grant williams, sidelined after right knee surgery.

Article Title: 'Light feels different this year': Anaya Bangar shares heartwarming Diwali photo with father Sanjay Bangar
Article Text:
Anaya Bangar (extreme right) with parents on Diwali.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Indian cricket stars spread Diwali cheer: Kohli, Gill & Bumrah’s festive wishes

Poll What do you think about Anaya Bangar's decision to come out and advocate for her rights in cricket? Inspiring and necessary Controversial and misunderstood Too much attention for a personal issue Not relevant to sports

Anaya Bangar on Tuesday shared a photo with her father Sanjay Bangar and her family after a long time on Diwali.Anaya shared the photo on Instagram and also penned a heartfelt note: "Light feels different this year — softer, steadier, closer to home." The photo has gone viral and has already hit 3 lakh likes.Earlier this year, Anaya had revealed that her father had made it clear that she would not be allowed to play cricket in the future."He was just stating the fact that there's no place for me in cricket. I had to take a stand for myself. I did get suicidal thoughts as it felt like the entire world was against me, and the decision I took (hormone therapy to become a woman) has now left me with no space in this system," Anaya had told Lallantop."Even basic opportunities and rights are no longer there for me. I still had space for myself from the family point of view. But it wasn't there in society, cricket, or the external world."Anaya had also revealed how she shared a “complex” relationship with her father."My relationship with my father is complex, like many families navigating change. I hope that one day he will find a way to stand beside me," she was quoted as saying by Hindustan Times.Earlier this year, Anaya had also posted on Instagram, where the 24-year-old shared a detailed scientific report to support her case to play cricket."It began as me wanting to play again, but the more I spoke up, the more I realised that my journey is tied to so many who feel invisible in Indian sport," Anaya wrote on Instagram."My personal dream and public advocacy have become the same thing now," she added. "Walking back onto the field, this time as Anaya, won’t just be about playing but reclaiming the right to belong, compete, and dream with dignity.""Well-known cricketers from both the men’s and women’s sides have messaged me. Some just sent a heart. Some said, ‘We see you.’ It made me emotional. Because in a sport where silence is common, even a whisper of support can feel like thunder," added Anaya.
Article Summary: Anaya bangar on tuesday shared a photo with her father sanjay bangar and her family after a long time on diwali. The photo has gone viral and has already hit 3 lakh likes. Earlier this year, anaya had revealed that her father had made it clear that she would not be allowed to play cricket in the future.

Article Title: 'He’s out of rhythm, out of touch' – Ex-India cricketer delivers harsh verdict on Virat Kohli
Article Text: Virat Kohli's familiar struggle with deliveries outside off stump resurfaced in the first ODI against Australia, leading to a duck. Former player Mohammad Kaif attributes this to a lack of match practice, impacting Kohli's rhythm and anticipation. Despite this setback, Kohli aims to find form at Adelaide Oval, a venue where he has a strong record.
Article Summary: Virat kohli's familiar struggle with deliveries outside off stump resurfaced in the first odi against australia. Former player mohammad kaif attributes this to a lack of match practice. Despite this setback, kohli aims to find form at adelaide oval, a venue where he has a strong record.

Article Title: 'You my girl': Hardik Pandya shares adorable photos, video with new beau Mahieka Sharma
Article Text:
Hardik Pandya and Mahieka Sharma (Instagram)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Hardik Pandya with Mahieka Sharma (Instagram)

Hardik Pandya with Mahieka Sharma

Hardik Pandya and Mahieka Sharma

Poll What do you think about Hardik Pandya's new relationship with Mahieka Sharma? Exciting and fresh start I have mixed feelings I wish him well, but not interested I don't support his new relationship

Star India cricketer Hardik Pandya has found love again.After making his relationship with Mahieka Sharma official on his 32nd birthday, the all-rounder has once again shared an adorable video with his new beau.The duo turned heads with their coordinated looks as they stepped out after a star-studded Diwali bash, sparking fresh buzz on social media about their rumored romance.The pair dazzled in matching red ethnic ensembles, igniting a social media frenzy. Mahieka shone in a red bandhani traditional suit, while Hardik paired a red kurta with black trousers, completing the look with his signature dark shades and gold accents.On Wednesday, October 22, Hardik Pandya shared sweet snapshots with his girlfriend Mahieka on Instagram. One picture captured the couple during their Maldives getaway, celebrating Hardik’s 32nd birthday on October 11, with Hardik in a printed shirt and Mahieka looking gorgeous in a white mini dress, holding his arm for the photo.Other highlights included the duo posing with their backs to the camera in front of Hardik's Lamborghini Urus and enjoying a buggy ride, with Hardik tenderly holding Mahieka’s hand.Sharing the photos, Hardik simply wrote, "Blessed," as the caption.Recently, the duo was also spotted at the airport. A video shared by Instant Bollywood on Instagram captured the couple strolling hand in hand through the airport check-in. When a paparazzo called out, “Nice jodi!” Hardik replied with a warm “Thank you!” while Mahieka blushed at the compliment. Fans couldn’t get enough of their chemistry as the duo exchanged smiles and a high-five, radiating comfort and happiness together.Hardik Pandya was previously married to actress Natasa Stankovic. The two tied the knot during the pandemic in 2020. Four years after their marriage, they announced their split in July last year.In a statement, Hardik shared, “After four years together, Natasa and I have chosen to part ways amicably. We did our utmost and invested everything we had, and we believe this decision is in the best interest of both parties. This was a challenging choice, considering the joy, mutual respect, and companionship we experienced while building a family.”Hardik and Natasa welcomed their son Agastya in 2020. They continue to co-parent him.
Article Summary: Star india cricketer hardik pandya has found love again. He made his relationship with mahieka sharma official on his 32nd birthday. The duo turned heads with their coordinated looks as they stepped out after a star-studded diwali bash.

Article Title: Rohit Sharma ‘deliberately underperforming’ under Shubman Gill? India legend fires back
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (ANI)

New ODI Captain Shubman Gill speaks out on Virat, Rohit and taking Indian cricket forward

India’s star openers had a forgettable start to the three-match ODI series against Australia in Perth on Sunday. Rohit Sharma managed just eight runs, while Virat Kohli was dismissed for a duck, as India lost the first match by seven wickets under the DLS method. The game also marked a new chapter in Indian cricket, with Shubman Gill taking over as the ODI captain, leading both veteran batters for the first time.Rohit’s low score sparked a flurry of speculation on social media, with some fans suggesting that the senior right-hander might have deliberately underperformed to challenge Gill’s authority as the new captain. These theories quickly went viral, drawing reactions from fans around the world.However, former India captain Sunil Gavaskar firmly dismissed such claims, stressing that no player would risk underperforming intentionally, as it could jeopardise their place in the team.“In Indian cricket, there’s a persistent myth that a player who loses the captaincy might underperform to undermine the new skipper,” Gavaskar wrote in his Sportstar column. “Nothing could be further from the truth. If a former captain doesn’t perform, he could be out of the team entirely. No player, regardless of personal feelings, would deliberately throw a game.”Gavaskar also highlighted that having experienced leaders like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli in the squad is a huge advantage for a young captain like Shubman Gill.The duo’s presence provides mentorship and guidance, which can help the new captain navigate his debut series.“Questions have been raised about whether Gill can handle two former captains in his team. But he has made it clear that his relationship with Rohit and Virat hasn’t changed with his new role,” Gavaskar added. “In fact, having them around is a bonus. Both are willing to offer advice when needed, and there’s no better support for a debutant captain than two of India’s greatest ODI players by his side.”
Article Summary: India's star openers had a forgettable start to the three-match odi series against australia in perth on sunday. Rohit sharma managed just eight runs, while virat kohli was dismissed for a duck. The game also marked a new chapter in indian cricket, with shubman gill taking over as the odi captain.

Article Title: 'Desh ka partition karke mann nahi bhara kya?' Sarfaraz Khan's India A snub gets political
Article Text:
Sarfaraz Khan

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Shama Mohamed tweet

Sitanshu Kotak press conference: Defends Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma and blames Perth weather

Shehzad Poonawalla tweet

Poll Do you think Sarfaraz Khan's exclusion from the India 'A' team is due to religious bias? Yes, it's a valid concern No, it's based on performance Uncertain, need more information Not sure what to think

A controversy erupted on Wednesday when Congress national spokesperson Shama Mohamed accused India head coach Gautam Gambhir of religious bias in team selection after Sarfaraz Khan was not included in the India 'A' team. The BCCI selection committee announced a 15-man India A squad for two first-class games against South Africa A, with chief selector Ajit Agarkar citing injury concerns for Sarfaraz's exclusion.Shama Mohamed took to social media platform X to question the selection decision. "Is Sarfaraz Khan not selected because of his surname! #justasking. We know where Gautam Gambhir stands on that matter," she wrote.BJP national spokesperson Shehzad Poonawalla responded strongly to the accusation. "This lady and her party are sick. After calling Rohit Sharma fat, she and her party now want to divide even our cricket team on communal lines? Desh ka partition karke mann nahi bhara kya? In the same team, Mohammad Siraj and Khaleel Ahmed will play! Stop dividing India on communal and caste lines," he posted on X.This is not the first controversy involving Shama Mohamed, as she had previously faced criticism for calling Rohit Sharma a "fat sportsperson" and "the most unimpressive captain" during the Champions Trophy in March.Sarfaraz Khan's last appearance for India 'A' was against the England Lions in Canterbury, where he scored 92 runs. The 27-year-old has maintained an impressive average of 110.47 in first-class cricket over the past five years, scoring 2,541 runs with five fifties and ten hundreds.His most recent international appearance was in November last year during the three-Test series against New Zealand at home, where he scored a century. He was the third-highest run-scorer in the series with 171 runs, behind Rishabh Pant (261) and Yashasvi Jaiswal (190).In his Test career spanning six matches, Sarfaraz has accumulated 371 runs at an average close to 40, including a notable 150 against New Zealand last year.
Article Summary: Congress national spokesperson shama mohamed accused india head coach gautam gambhir of religious bias in team selection. The bcci selection committee announced a 15-man india a squad for two first-class games against south africa a. Chief selector ajit agarkar cited injury concerns for sarfaraz's exclusion.

Article Title: Mohsin Naqvi gives new twist to Asia Cup controversy; sends stern message to BCCI – 'If you want the trophy…'
Article Text:
Pakistani politician and President of the Asian Cricket Council Mohsin Naqvi stands near the presentation area after India won the Asia Cup cricket final against Pakistan at Dubai International Cricket Stadium, United Arab Emirates, Sunday, Sept. 28, 2025. (AP Photo/Altaf Qadri)

Inside details of how PCB chief Mohsin Naqvi ran away with the Asia Cup trophy!

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Should the BCCI accept the trophy from Mohsin Naqvi in Dubai? Yes, it's time to resolve the dispute No, maintain the current stance Only if certain conditions are met I have no opinion on this

It seems like the Asia Cup trophy row is not going to calm down anytime soon.A significant dispute has emerged between the Board of Control for Cricket in India BCCI ) and the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) ahead of next month's International Cricket Council meeting, as PCB chairman Mohsin Naqvi insists on personally presenting the Asia Cup trophy to India at a ceremony in Dubai on November 10.GEO News has reported that ACC chief Mohsin Naqvi wrote a stern email to the BCCI, proposing a ceremony where BCCI representatives and available Indian team players can receive the trophy from him as ACC President.“If you want the trophy, we can hold a ceremony where you can receive it,” Geo News reported."The ACC trophy rightly belongs to the Indian cricket team and is being held in trust until such time that a BCCI office holder along with any available participating player can collect it from the ACC President," Naqvi stated in his reply."Such collection would, of course, be accompanied with much fanfare and coverage, as there should be no deviation from established practices and no precedent should be set that undermines the spirit of the game we all love."The controversy unfolded after the Indian men’s cricket team declined to collect their winners’ medals and trophy following their triumph in the ACC Men’s T20 Asia Cup 2025 final at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium on September 29.The standoff reportedly stemmed from tensions between the Indian team and the Asian Cricket Council (ACC), as players refused to accept the silverware from ACC President Mohsin Naqvi, who also heads the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB).The post-match presentation, delayed by nearly an hour, saw only a few Indian players — Kuldeep Yadav, Shivam Dube, and Tilak Varma — step forward to receive individual performance awards. Pakistan skipper Salman Ali Agha collected the runners-up cheque.Kuldeep was later honoured as the tournament’s top wicket-taker, while opener Abhishek Sharma earned the Player of the Tournament title for amassing 314 runs in seven innings at an average of 44.85.However, the event concluded without India lifting the winner’s trophy. Presenter Simon Doull announced, “I have been informed by the ACC that the Indian cricket team will not be collecting their awards tonight. That concludes the post-match presentation.”
Article Summary: Mohsin naqvi insists on personally presenting the asia cup trophy to india at a ceremony in dubai on november 10. The standoff reportedly stemmed from tensions between the indian team and the asian cricket council (acc) the controversy unfolded after the indian men’s cricket team declined to collect their winners’ medals and trophy following their triumph.

Article Title: Phoenix Suns Vs Sacramento Kings (10-22-2025) game preview: When and where to watch, expected lineup, prediction, and more
Article Text:
Phoenix Suns Vs Sacramento Kings





Phoenix Suns Vs Sacramento Kings - When and where to watch the game



Phoenix Suns Vs Sacramento Kings - Expected Starting Lineups

Phoenix Suns

Sacramento Kings

Phoenix Suns Vs Sacramento Kings - Game Prediction

The 2025–26 NBA season officially began on Tuesday. Fans now look forward to see their favorite teams play, i.e. Phoenix Suns vs. Sacramento Kings. The Suns begin the 2025–26 NBA season on October 22 with a home game against the Kings. On Wednesday, Devin Booker's squad will take on DeMar DeRozan's squad. Read ahead to find out more about the matches here, streaming services, injuries and probable lineups.At Phoenix , Arizona's Mortgage Matchup Centre, the Sacramento Kings and Phoenix Suns will play their first match of the season on Wednesday. The scheduled tip-off time is 10 p.m. ET. Fans may watch the game live on NBA TV and NBC Sports California.Grayson Allen (G) Devin Booker (G)Dillon Brooks (GF)Ryan Dunn (F)Dylan Cardwell (C )Devin Carter (G)Nique Clifford (G) DeMar DeRozan (G/F)Keon Ellis (G)Drew Eubanks (F/C)Isaac Jones (F)After winning 40 games during the regular season , including three victories over the Suns, the Kings qualified for the Play-In Tournament the previous year. After performing admirably temporarily, Doug Christie now assumes the role of full-time coach. Along with Dennis Schroder and Russell Westbrook, the Kings also recruited Drew Eubanks and Dario Saric. Colorado State standout Nique Clifford was also a good addition through the NBA Draft.The Suns shook things up in the offseason by trading Kevin Durant to the Houston Rockets in a massive seven-team transaction. On the other hand, they also signed Devin Booker to an extension.The draft's big acquisition is rookie Khaman Maluach, while Dillon Brooks and Jalen Green are also there.However, Green is out due to a hamstring injury, so Suns’ fans will have to wait a little while to see him. Additionally, Tyus Jones and Bradley Beal are no longer there. Green was brought in to be a key member of the team's core, but he is out for the first game due to a hamstring injury , thus the Suns are a little concerned.On the other hand, the Kings have issues themselves, with the big man Sabonis on the shelf due to a hamstring issue. Murray is also on the shelf. Sacto doesn't have a ton of depth, so missing big chunks of scoring from Murray and Sabonis will hurt.Also read: Portland Trail Blazers Vs Minnesota Timberwolves (10-22-2025) game preview: When and where to watch, expected lineup, prediction, and more
Article Summary: The 2025–26 nba season officially began on tuesday. The phoenix suns and sacramento kings will play their first match of the season on wednesday. The suns shook things up in the offseason by trading kevin durant to the houston rockets in a massive seven-team transaction. The kings recruited drew eubanks and dario saric through the nba draft.

Article Title: Pierre Engvall’s season ends after ankle surgery, Islanders face depth test
Article Text:
Pierre Engvall (Image Via Twitter)

Mathieu Darche confirms Pierre Engvall’s season-ending surgery

Pierre Engvall’s injury adds pressure on the Islanders’ future moves

The New York Islanders have suffered another injury, and this time, it’s a huge loss. Forward Pierre Engvall, who is recognized for his speed and two-way play, will be out for the rest of the season. Engvall has already experienced a long summer of battling back from a hip injury in the course of his recovery, and now it is taking another unfortunate turn. The news not only puts a dampener on the team’s momentum but also casts a shadow over his long-term future with the Islanders as they navigate a crucial season.In a statement released on Wednesday, Islanders’ general manager Mathieu Darche affirmed that Pierre Engvall underwent successful ankle surgery and is going to be off the ice for the entire season. The 29-year-old forward had already been put on the injured reserve due to offseason hip surgery and had not yet played a game this season.Engvall, who was acquired by New York in a trade from the Toronto Maple Leafs in 2023, had hinted at being a reliable and depth scorer. In the last season, he scored eight goals and provided seven assists in 62 games before injuries took over. His absence creates a void in the Islanders’ forward lineup, which will be a test for their depth as they continue to battle in the Eastern Conference.Pierre Engvall really got a rough deal with this injury situation, as it could not have been at a worse time for him. He is in the third year of his seven-year, $21 million contract, and the question of his availability has arisen. Analysts are of the view that if recovery takes longer than expected, New York might think about moving its $3 million cap hit in the offseason for the sake of roster flexibility.The good news is, Varlamov is the only one who has gotten back to skating after surgery to the knee, so there is some hope among the injured players. However, Engvall's absence will surely cause a loss to the team. The Islanders are looking at younger players like Matthew Schaefer, and that might change the team's retooling plans once again.Pierre Engvall's injury has been a setback, but his endurance is surely going to match his hustle on the ice, and therefore, fans can expect a powerful comeback in 2026. At the moment, his priority is healing — and showing that this injury will not overshadow his time with the Islanders.Also Read: Who are Auston Matthews’ parents? Inside the life of Maple Leafs captain and his family
Article Summary: New york islanders forward pierre engvall will be out for the rest of the season. The 29-year-old had already been put on the injured reserve due to hip surgery. The news puts a dampener on the team's momentum and casts a shadow over his future.

Article Title: “It’s too early to say”: Senator captain Brady Tkachuk opens up for the first time after surgery, says return is still uncertain
Article Text:
Ottawa Senators forward Tkachuk expected to miss four major weeks after suffering wrist injury (Image via Getty Images)

Ottawa Senators captain Brady Tkachuk’s return to the team remains uncertain

Revisiting Tkachuk’s career with the Ottawa Senators so far

Also read

The Ottawa Senators captain, Brady Tkachuk, has finally opened up for the first time on Wednesday after undergoing surgery to repair a torn ligament on his right thumb last week. The captain has stated that while his return currently has no definitive timetable for his NHL comeback, he remains confident he’ll be back in action in time for the upcoming Olympic Games.Earlier, the 26-year-old winger suffered the injury during the third game of the season on October 9, 2025, after getting cross-checked by Nashville Predators defenceman Roman Josi. Following the injury, Tkachuk announced that he is expected to miss around 6-8 weeks. Tkachuk Captain Brady confirmed on Wednesday that his return to the team remains unclear, due to his injury that he sustained during a match with the Nashville Predators . According to the organization, Tkachuk is recovering from recent surgery to repair a ligament injury and is engaging in treatment and rehabilitation.Speaking for the first time after his surgery, Tkachuk stated regarding a timeline for his return to the lineup, “It’s too early to say. Of course, I’ll try to get back on the first possible day….I’m able to skate now and it’s only been nine days off the ice, so the legs and conditioning will stay. But it’s just going to be a little bit before I can stickhandle and shoot.”About his successful surgery and recovery, the 26-year-old winger further said, .They re-stabilized the joints. I was under for a two-hour nap - I was fired up about that.” He lastly added that the surgery went well, “They said it went awesome, very, very smooth.”Speaking to the media, Tkachuk also acknowledged how difficult it has been to watch from the sidelines, but emphasized his commitment to returning strong, “That’s not really in my thought process or mindset. My sole focus is getting back to help this team and get us in the best spot possible,” he added.Tkachuk has become a cornerstone for Ottawa after being drafted fourth overall in the 2018 NHL Draft. Now in his eighth NHL season, Tkachuk led the Senators with 29 goals last year, marking his fourth straight season with at least that total. His consistent scoring and leadership have made him one of the league’s most reliable power forwards.Tkachuk was also a standout performer for Team USA during last February’s Four Nations Face-Off, where he scored three goals in four games as the Americans fell to Canada in an overtime thriller in the championship game in Boston.
Article Summary: Brady tkachuk underwent surgery to repair a torn ligament on his right thumb last week. The 26-year-old winger suffered the injury during the third game of the season on october 9, 2025, after getting cross-checked by nashville predators defenceman roman josi.

Article Title: Fans compare Las Vegas Raiders offensive line coach Brennan Carroll to WWE legend The Undertaker
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Brennan Carroll and The Undertaker)

While Raiders coach Brennan Carroll talked about the performance of players—fans ignored what he said and only noticed his eyes

Looks more like Edge, not The Undertaker

Also Read:

Anything out of the ordinary catches the eye. That’s what happened with the Las Vegas Raiders' offensive line coach Brennan Carroll. While being interviewed about his team’s players, the cameraman focused on his face. Now, with every sentence, fans noticed his eyes. One said, “What is wrong with his eyeballs?👀 as soon as the man starts talking, his eyeballs start doing some exorcist type stuff.” Another declared, “Dude thinks he’s the undertaker .” A third fan shared WWE legend The Undertaker’s signature gimmick reserved for specific matches—coming out of a coffin as a GIF with the caption: “Bro after every sentence.”A fan questioned, “Why does he keep rolling his eyes?” Another elaborated the question further, “Why do his eyes roll back in his head when he answers?” A third fan commented, “What he’s doing with his eyes is freaking me out.” A fourth fan declared, “Why is he closing his eyes when answering? No wonder he can't see what's wrong with our offensive line!” A fifth fan sarcastically said, “What’s wrong with his eyes. Maybe that’s why the OL can’t play well lol. The man can’t see!!!” A fan chimed in, “What’s the deal with the half blinking. Seems like he’s lying with every sentence he says.” Another fan mentioned WWE legend after numerous speculations: “Is he on drugs or a medical issue?? Is this a tick or something that’s normal with his interviews his pupils look huge, he’s rolling his eyes like the undertaker??? What’s going on??”Sports Media Personality Dov Kleiman also reshared Brennan Carroll’s video interview on X with the caption: “Raiders coach Brennan Carroll has gone viral for his strange interview…Brennan is the son of Vegas’s HC Pete Carroll.😬😬😬.” A fan speculated, “That’s a “tic” a mild form of Tourette’s.” Another said that he looked more like Adam Copeland, better known by the ring name “Edge”: “He looks like edge not the undertaker. ” A third fan speculated too, “Maybe he’s high.” A brutally honest fan commented, “Worst o-line in the NFL. It starts w him. If he can't handle straight forward questions about his job, he needs to go.”A fan asked X (Twitter)’s artificial intelligence, Grok: “@grok is there a medical condition which has his eyes moving like that or what do u think it could be?” Grok replied, “The eye movements appear similar to nystagmus, involving rapid, involuntary oscillations (side-to-side, up-down, or circular). Per sources like Cleveland Clinic, it can be congenital or acquired from factors like inner ear disorders, medications, alcohol, or neurological conditions. I'm not a medical expert—best to consult a doctor for any diagnosis.”
Article Summary: Las vegas raiders' offensive line coach brennan carroll was being interviewed about his team's players. With every sentence, fans noticed his eyes. A fan speculated, “that’s a “tic” a mild form of tourette”s. Another said that he looked more like adam copeland, better known by the ring name “edge”

Article Title: “Did a lot of action at Fox”: LeSean McCoy hints at Joy Taylor’s alleged affair with Emmanuel Acho on live TV
Article Text:
Image - x

Speakeasy

LeSean McCoy hints at secret Joy Taylor romance during live show

“Says the guy that did a lot of action at Fox, but we ain’t gonna talk about all that.”

The Joy Taylor connection: what’s confirmed and what’s not

Emmanuel Acho’s reaction and handling of the moment

“That was the biggest violation in this show’s history.”

Things got tense onwhen former NFL star LeSean McCoy threw a comment at co-host Emmanuel Acho that immediately caught the internet’s attention. The remark, referencing Joy Taylor, quickly went viral as fans reacted in shock, amusement, and confusion. Acho, visibly uncomfortable, ended the show abruptly, leaving viewers wondering what prompted McCoy’s bold on-air comment. Here’s the breakdown of what really happened.The moment went down during a live segment when McCoy leaned into a jab at Acho, saying:The comment, though cryptic, was interpreted by fans as a reference to a rumored off-screen connection between Acho and former Fox host Joy Taylor. Clips of the exchange quickly circulated online, sparking thousands of reactions. Fans flooded X (formerly Twitter) with jokes, memes, and debates, some calling it a “wildest live moment ever,” others saying Acho looked “utterly done” with the conversation.Here’s where fact and speculation diverge. McCoy’s comment alludes to off-screen rumors that have circulated online, including mentions in previous lawsuits and workplace chatter about Joy Taylor.However, nothing has been officially confirmed regarding any relationship between Acho and Taylor. The only verified points: McCoy said the line live, and fans interpreted it as referencing Taylor. Everything else remains speculation, fueled by social media.Acho didn’t let the moment slide silently. He ended the live stream abruptly, telling viewers:His reaction suggested he felt the comment crossed a line, though he did not address or confirm any rumors about Taylor. Acho’s measured response highlights how hosts often have to navigate unexpected drama on live shows, balancing humor and fact.Whether you see it as a shocking on-air moment or just a live-show meme waiting to happen, the McCoy–Acho exchange captured attention for all the right reasons. Acho handled it with poise, McCoy kept his edge, and fans got a viral clip to talk about for days. One thing’s certain, in the world of sports media, no snack, joke, or comment goes unnoticed.Also read - NFL commissioner Roger Goodell fires back at MAGA critics and Donald Trump over Bad Bunny Super Bowl halftime show
Article Summary: Former nfl star lesean mccoy threw a comment at co-host emmanuel acho that immediately caught the internet’s attention. The remark, referencing joy taylor, quickly went viral as fans reacted in shock, amusement, and confusion. Acho, visibly uncomfortable, ended the show abruptly, leaving viewers wondering what prompted mccoy's bold on-air comment.
